localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The joyful card platform ✨ Teamo has everything you need to create delightful group cards for any occasion with fun messages, photos, and loopy GIFs. Customizable, schedulable, and perfect for collaboration 💛 🎉
blogPost.body: The joyful card platform ✨ Teamo has everything you need to create delightful group cards for any occasion with fun messages, photos, and loopy GIFs. Customizable, schedulable, and perfect for collaboration 💛 🎉
blogPost.title: Teamo 2.0 - Designed for the group, built for the celebration
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 欢乐贺卡平台✨ Teamo拥有一切您需要的东西，为任何场合创建令人愉快的团体贺卡，并提供有趣的信息、照片和循环GIF。可定制，可安排，非常适合协作💛 🎉?
localize.tagline: 为集团设计，为庆典而建

localize.description: 歡樂賀卡平臺✨ Teamo擁有一切您需要的東西，爲任何場合創建令人愉快的團體賀卡，並提供有趣的信息、照片和循環GIF。可定製，可安排，非常適合協作💛 🎉?
localize.tagline: 爲集團設計，爲慶典而建

previous.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
previous.title: Google Fonts Icons - Google Fonts now supports icons

localize.description: Google Fonts获得了新的标志，因为目录中增加了图标，从Material Icons开始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字体现在支持图标

localize.description: Google Fonts獲得了新的標誌，因爲目錄中增加了圖標，從Material Icons開始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字體現在支持圖標

next.excerpt: Amaze your friends with GIFs of historical figures that are ready to use on Giphy.com. At yadada.app, we used a great AI tool from Rosebud AI to map 15 emotions to 30 historical figures like Shakespeare, Tesla, Franklin (full list in the comments).
next.title: Historical Animated GIFs - Over 500 animated GIFs of talking historical figures

localize.description: 用Giphy.com上准备好的历史人物的GIF来惊艳你的朋友。在yadada.app，我们使用了Rosebud AI的一个伟大的AI工具，将15种情绪映射到30个历史人物身上，如莎士比亚、特斯拉、富兰克林（完整列表在评论中）。
localize.tagline: 超过500个会说话的历史人物的GIF动画。

localize.description: 用Giphy.com上準備好的歷史人物的GIF來驚豔你的朋友。在yadada.app，我們使用了Rosebud AI的一個偉大的AI工具，將15種情緒映射到30個歷史人物身上，如莎士比亞、特斯拉、富蘭克林（完整列表在評論中）。
localize.tagline: 超過500個會說話的歷史人物的GIF動畫。
